::Savanna::

She emerged from the CR chamber.  She walked slowly out of the room 
in lioness mode.  She went to the front of the ship and looked at the 
sky.  She layed down and put her head on her paws.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Striker/Ramulus/Firearm/Rex/Smokescreen/Kluster::
> 
> "YEAH!" Firearm yells as the two attackers get blown out of the 
field. The 
> big Maximal was still eager for battle, but victory was a welcome 
thing also. 
> He looks around, then walking off toward the CR chambers.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Ramulus smiles as the attackers are neutralized. He too turns, 
heading for 
> the CR chambers, followed by Striker and Smokescreen.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Rex grins. They had won agian! This mission wasn't as difficult as 
the elders 
> had assured them....
> 
> He looks around the battlefield. "Anyone need help to a CR 
chamber?" he asks.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Kluster glances at the scanners and exterior visuals. The fighting 
seemed to 
> have stopped, and there were no enemies detected aproaching the 
Cybertronian 
> Fire.
> 
> "Maximals," he says into his comm, set on all Maximal 
frequences, "The battle 
> at the Cybertronian Fire is over. We won."
> 
> With that, he looks back at Phobia's messenger, waiting for some 
action from 
> it. He frowns as the scanners beep, looking at them to see a ship 
leaving the 
> planet.
> 
> "Computer, scan ship."
> 
> "Negative. Ship out of scanning range."
> 
> "Anything?"
> 
> "The ship is of Predacon/Decepticon origin."
> 
> Kluster frowns again. "Scan predacon base."
> 
> He looks at the results, noting a decrease of bots. His frown 
deepens. So the 
> Predacons have decided to leave?
